descriptionlist.description:
Features of iDunnoU:
• Automatic hiding of dialogues from unknown senders. • Swipe the dialog to the left to pin / unpin it. • Swipe right on the dialog to hide / show or lock / unlock it. • Enter edit mode to change the order of dialogs. • Protect your list of unknown senders with Face ID, Touch ID, or passcode. • Automatic sync of all lists in iCloud.
